heat erasable fabric pen + heat source to fingering cake erase ink amigurumi yarn - sport acetate cardboard or plastic box ribbon mix of white glue and water ratio 1 1 + clea yarn - thread size brush to apply 10 embroidery fabric glue brown fabric paint + thin brush yarn colors for the cake - pink for the box - white for the ribbon - dark blue for embroidery - green free pattern - furifuri amigurumi - 2023 rubeus hagrid cake with the pink yarn 14 blo 5sc 1dec x6 36 15 4sc 1dec x6 30 1 6sc in the magic_ring 16 3sc 1dec x6 24 2 6inc 12 do not overfill so as not to deform 3 1sc 1inc x6 18 the piece flatten with a felting 4 2sc 1inc x6 24 needle to give it a better shape 5 3sc 1inc x6 30 17 2sc 1dec x6 18 6 4sc 1inc x6 36 18 1sc 1dec x6 12 7 5sc 1inc x6 42 19 6dec 6 8 42sc in the third loop or bpsc glue a piece of acetate/plastic to the close with inverted magic_ring finish off base of the piece and hide the leftover yarn 9 to 13 42sc - 5 rounds free pattern - furifuri amigurumi - 2023 embroidery first we will mark the embroidery area to do this use the erasable pen start by marking the division of the cake which is where it broke use the pictures to guide you after that trace the letters across the surface of the cake as shown in the picture to the right h a p p e e b i r t h d a e h a r r y with a thin brush and the brown fabric paint paint the center line wait for it to dry and then embroider the letters with the green thread take your time following the marking with the pen for the rounded letters i suggest you use fabric glue to fix them in the desired shape finally use some heat source to erase the ink from the heat erasable pen i use a hair dryer free pattern -
